title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Lagos, Portugal
content:
Photo submitted by Pedro Cravinho, “When i was returning home with my new SCOTT SPARK RC TEAM ISSUE AXS, i saw these graffiti expression, and thought to myself ‘OMG, that bike is so beautiful!!!’🥰 I had to stop and take a picture!” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to
